text.p1: (Before iTech Team)
text.p2: Charles start to building his personal webpage for the first time, with the host name www.icharleshu.com

text.p1: The iTech team inaugurates. Website Program initiates.
text.p2: The team start building the website using program "RapidWeaver 5".

text.p1: www.icharleshu.com updates to Version 0.
text.p2: We finish building website with sub-page "Blogs" and "Photos".
text.p3: This is our first time to publish the website.

text.p1: During the team meeting we decide to stop using "RapidWeaver", but start hand-coding instead.
text.p2: We rename the project to Project Tiramisu.

text.p1: www.icharleshu.com updates to Version 1.
text.p2: Our first design bases on the design of http://builtwithmomentum.com
text.p3: Page created: Home, Gallery and Blog.
text.p4: Semester is ending. The team will collaborate over the air during summer vacation vacation.

text.p1: www.icharleshu.com updates to Version 1.1
text.p2: This update contains a experimental animation generated by Adobe Edge Animate and some minor UI fix.

text.p1: During the Conference Call the team decides to rebuild the website with a more vivid UI.
text.p2: Team starts to do research for new website

text.p1: www.icharleshu.com updates to Version 2
text.p2: The basic structure of the website is done. Team now working on details and subpages

text.p1: iTech Team reunions. We start planning for the new semester.
text.p2: More detail added on the page: Little cluster animation and Leader pictures.

text.p1: "Work" page added. We use this page to present pictures and works.
text.p2: More detail added to the main page.

text.p1: iTech team starts producing tutorial videos for students in Washington Academy.
iTech Team's first video is produced! In this video we presented how to use the basic functions of Google Doc.
text.p2: (This video is made specifically for Washington Academy Students.)
text.p3: Also we updated our Work page to host the video.

text.p1: iTech Team published their second video!
The team decide to renew the website for the third time, as a part of year long project.
text.p2: The team decide to hold public meeting during second semester featuring web design discussion.

text.p1: After a month of research and design, a prototype of icharleshu.com Version 3 has been created.
www.icharleshu.com updates to Version 3
text.p2: We add more animation element into the third design, the new page is simple and elegant.

text.p1: iTech Team decides to collaborate with the new founded team: Photography Team.
text.p2: The two teams will work together to produce videos and online galleries for Washington Academy.

text.p1: www.icharleshu.com updates to Version 3.1
text.p2: In this update: place holders has been added for the photography team; "Detailed Information" section added.

text.p1: "History" (or Building Log, This page) page added. We keep track of our progress as we building the website.
"About Us" page added. www.icharleshu.com updates to version 3.3.
text.p2: Team is still working on the description section.

text.p1: iTech team starts building Gallery page.
